notes: Dataset combines directly reported experimental values (high confidence) and model-derived values (Ratkowsky-based) from peer-reviewed sources. Use 'confidence_score' to filter during training.

sources.title: Rethinking Tertiary Models: Relationships between Growth Parameters of Bacillus cereus Strains
Modeling Bacillus cereus Growth and Cereulide Formation in Food and Culture Medium
Post-Cooking Growth and Survival of Bacillus cereus Spores in Rice
Effect of Temperature, pH, and a_w on Cereulide Synthesis and Regulator Genes Transcription...

how_to_use: Filter rows by 'confidence_score' when training (e.g., >= 0.7). 'growth_rate_per_hour' is the primary target for EnvModel training. Some rows only provide Ymax or final counts - use those for alternative targets.
